text: Hey - Has Any done a Google Map Store with a search feature so a user can find there local store. I know you can do it on Wordpress so you add the locations of all the stores onto the DB and pull it in via PHP. Has anyone done this on HubSpot?
As in find the closest store?
There is a `location` type column that you can use in conjuction with an `orderBy=geo_distance`: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/hubdb/get_table_rows>
<@U4F337UM8> You can check out this page we did <https://go.saniflo.com/usa/residential/search-results?type=dealer&zip=90210>
Does basically what <@U6GNQ7JBU> describes but uses almost entirely the HubDB geo filter + columns to generate the input for google maps (probably not the best solution - but it works well enough)
